page.title: 04Ythanwells leisure activity.
page.content: At the school there is a community club, where bowling and darts are played.the members meet at 7 pm on Monday and Thursday nights.There are 21 bowlers, 17 men and 5 ladies.All the bowlers play darts too,but they do not have a darts tournament.There are 2 bowling tournaments every year, when people from a wide district flock to Ythanwells.At the last tournament we had 120 entrants from as far as Fintry Daviot and Turriff. The tournaments last between 2 and 3 weeks. the ladies of the district provide tea,coffee,hot snacks and homebaking,and this helps to raise funds for the prizes and the upkeep of equipment.Last year surplus funds were gifted to the cavitron appeal,and Â£60 were donated to the school for a computer.
